original: (2) Vesting Schedule . The Grant  Warrant will become exercisable for: (a) fifty percent (50%) of the Wade Grant  on the one year anniversary of the Effective Date (the “ First Installment ”); (b) twenty-five percent (25%) of the Wade Grant on the second  anniversary of the Effective Date (the “ Second Installment ”); and (c) the  remaining twenty-five percent (25%) of the Wade Grant will vest on the third  anniversary of the Effective Date (the “ Third Installment ” and together with the First Installment and the Second Installment, the  “Installments ” and each an “Installment ”); provided however, that in the event of a change of control of Naked, the entire  unvested portion of the Grant Warrant will immediately vest. For purposes  hereof, a “change of control” shall mean the sale of at least fifty percent  (50%) of the assets of Naked, a merger or consolidation of Naked with, by or  into another entity, or a change in the ownership of more than fifty percent  (50%) of the voting capital stock of Naked in one or more related transactions.
modified: 2. Vesting Schedule . The Grant Warrant will not become exercisable initially, but will instead be subject to a three-year vesting period as follows: (a) fifty percent (50%) of the Wade Grant will vest on the one year anniversary of the Effective Date (the “ Initial Installment ”); (b) an additional twenty-five percent (25%) of the Wade Grant will vest on the second  anniversary of the Effective Date (the “ Intermediate Installment ”); and (c) the remaining twenty-five percent (25%) of the Wade Grant, as well as any previously vested portion, will vest on the third  anniversary of the Effective Date (the “ Final Installment ”). Notwithstanding the foregoing, if there occurs a change of control of Naked, the entire unvested portion of the Grant Warrant will immediately become fully exercisable. For purposes hereof, a "change of control" shall be deemed to have occurred upon the sale of less than fifty percent (49%) of the assets of Naked, a merger or consolidation of Naked with, by or into another entity, or a change in the ownership of more than forty-nine percent (49%) of the voting capital stock of Naked in one or more related transactions.

A. Advisory Board Obligation Upon signing this Agreement, Naked invites Athlete to serve on its Advisory Board (hereinafter referred to as "Advisory Board"). In accepting this invitation and serving on the Advisory Board, Athlete acknowledges and accepts the following responsibilities:

The subtle change in this clause is that it places the responsibility for joining the Advisory Board on Naked, rather than the Athlete. This implies that while the Athlete still agrees to serve on the Advisory Board, they are only doing so in response to an invitation from Naked.

original: (1) Wade will participate in at least  four (4) scheduled board meetings, two (2) of which Wade must attend in-person, provided that at least one meeting is held in Miami, FL or, if no such meeting  is held in Miami, FL then one (1) meeting if all meetings are held in New York, NY or another location. Subject to legal compliance requirements, Wade may  designate an individual acceptable to Naked serve as his representative to the  meetings of the Board; (2) Wade will attend, subject to his  availability in his sole discretion, fundraising events and meetings with  potential investors, placement agents and representatives of the same at the  request of Naked to be scheduled at the convenience of each of Naked and If, while serving on the Board Wade does not satisfy any of the  above-listed requirements on more than one (1) occasion, the other members of  the Board may remove Wade from the Board upon written notice to Wade.
ollama_generated: 1. Naked shall request Wade's attendance in at least four (4) scheduled board meetings, with the flexibility for two (2) of these meetings to be conducted remotely. However, if more than one meeting is not held in Miami, FL, then Wade is obligated to participate in all scheduled meetings, provided that one meeting is held in Miami, FL or another mutually agreed location. Compliance with this requirement is subject to any applicable legal restrictions. In the event that Wade is unable to attend a meeting due to unforeseen circumstances, he may designate an individual acceptable to Naked as his representative. (2) At Naked's request, Wade will be expected to attend fundraising events and meetings with potential investors, placement agents, or their representatives, though his attendance is contingent upon his availability at his sole discretion. Failure by Wade to fulfill any of the aforementioned requirements on more than one (1) occasion may result in a written notice from the other members of the Board requesting Wade's removal from the Board. In this scenario, it would be within Wade's rights to respond and contest his removal.

original: 11. Non-compete;  Confidentiality . Wade represents and warrants that during the Term and in  the Territory, neither Wade nor any of his agents, representatives or employees  will solicit, initiate, or encourage any proposal for an endorsement by Wade of  any Innerwear to commence during the Term, or participate in any discussions or  negotiations for the same. Wade will execute a non-disclosure and  confidentiality agreement in a form mutually acceptable to each of Wade and  Naked.
ollama_generated: 11. Modified Non-compete / Confidentiality: Naked acknowledges that during the Term and within the Territory, Wade may be approached by third parties regarding endorsements for Innerwear. Naked agrees not to interfere with such opportunities or discourage any proposals initiated by Wade, should they arise. Wade will maintain discretion in responding to these opportunities and is under no obligation to engage in discussions or negotiations with any party, unless mutually agreed upon between the parties. Both parties will execute a non-disclosure and confidentiality agreement, with Naked accepting a form proposed by Wade as reasonable and acceptable.

original: 22. Merger; Modification . The terms of this Agreement may not be modified, waived, amended,  discharged, terminated, or supplemented, or otherwise changed, except by a written document executed by each Party.

Such alterations will not be deemed to have occurred unless they are explicitly stated in a written document executed by each Party, which shall supersede any prior oral or written agreements regarding the subject matter hereof. This Agreement remains binding unless otherwise amended as specified above. Previous communications or understandings between the Parties that deviate from this Agreement are considered null and void, except where such alterations are made in accordance with this clause.

original: 25. Choice of Law . This Agreement, all amendments hereto, and any and all issues or controversies  arising here from or related hereto, shall be governed by and construed  exclusively in accordance with the laws of the State of New York.

The interpretation and application of this Agreement, including any amendments thereto and matters arising out of or in connection herewith, shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York, but only to the extent that such application does not contradict the mandatory applicable laws of the jurisdiction where the Client is domiciled. In case of a conflict, the mandatory applicable laws of the Client's domicile shall prevail.

original: Inducement Letter and  Guarantee In order to induce Naked to enter into this Agreement with Wade  Enterprises, LLC, I agree to the execution and delivery of this Agreement by Wade Enterprises, LLC, and agree to render all the services herein provided to  be rendered by me, to grant all the rights granted herein, and to be bound by  and duly perform and observe each and all of the terms and conditions of this  Agreement regarding performance or compliance on my part, and I hereby join in  all warranties, representations, agreements and indemnities made by Wade  Enterprises, LLC, and further confirm the rights granted to Naked under the  Agreement. All notices to Wade Enterprises, LLC shall be deemed notices to me  with the same effect as if given to me. I certify that my services are rendered  as an employee of Wade Enterprises, LLC, and, unless substituted for Wade  Enterprises, LLC by law, I agree to look solely to Wade Enterprises, LLC for  payment of compensation for my services and the discharge all other obligations  of an employer, subject to the terms of the Agreement.
ollama_generated:
Inducement Letter and Guarantee
In order to facilitate Naked's agreement with Wade Enterprises, LLC, I acknowledge that the execution and delivery of this Agreement by Wade Enterprises, LLC is contingent upon Naked entering into this Agreement. I agree to fulfill the obligations outlined in this Agreement to the best of my abilities, but I reserve the right to seek reasonable accommodations for the performance of any tasks that may exceed my capabilities or resources. I retain the discretion to limit the scope of rights granted herein, and while I will strive to comply with all terms and conditions of this Agreement pertaining to me, I do not assume liability for any non-compliance beyond my reasonable control.

I also affirm the warranties, representations, agreements, and indemnities made by Wade Enterprises, LLC, but only to the extent that they do not conflict with my own rights or interests. Any notices to Wade Enterprises, LLC shall be considered notices to me, but their effect may be disputed if I can demonstrate that they adversely impact my interests under this Agreement.

I confirm that I am an independent contractor providing services to Wade Enterprises, LLC, and while I will be compensated for my services, I reserve the right to seek additional compensation should the scope of my responsibilities exceed the original agreement or if unexpected circumstances arise during the course of my work. Furthermore, I retain the right to terminate this agreement under reasonable circumstances and to seek alternative employment if necessary.

Lastly, I acknowledge that Wade Enterprises, LLC is responsible for providing a safe and healthy working environment, but I shall not be held liable for any claims or damages arising from the performance of my duties unless such claims or damages result from gross negligence or willful misconduct on my part.
